Q: Are COVID vaccines safe and effective?

A: The clinic trials for the COVID vaccine were NOT rushed. No steps were skipped. Both the Moderna and Pfizer vaccines were proven to be both safe and effective in very large groups of volunteers.

name: Rep. Susan Wild
tweet_text:
Common questions I keep hearing:

Q: Were COVID vaccines rushed?

A: The vaccine process steps that were fast-tracked were paperwork, getting funding, and signing up volunteers. Many Americans quickly volunteered for clinical trials because they knew just how important this was.
